Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
represents the game. this class is used as root of the model to connect every entity inside of it.
Since:
1.5
